# Pull Request: RAG Knowledge Service Delivery Assurance Engineering System

## Summary
This PR adds a new engineering system demonstrating production-ready RAG service delivery from development through deployment and testing.

- ✅ Evidence-based validation covering API functionality, containerization, orchestration, and CI/CD automation
- ✅ Updated repository index files to include new system
